name: prop
trans: an object that is used on a theater stage or in a movie

name: Gesture
trans: a movement of the body, hands, arms, or head to express an idea or feeling

name: portray
trans: to represent or describe someone or something in a book, movie, etc.

name: culminate
trans: to have as a result or be the final result of a process

name: abstract
trans: existing as an idea, feeling, or quality, not as a material object

name: literal
trans: having exactly the same meaning as the basic or original meaning of a word or expression

name: conflict
trans: an active disagreement, as between opposing opinions or needs

name: humorous
trans: funny, or making you laugh

name: exaggerated
trans: to be hugely increased; bigger than necessary

name: sharpen
trans: to make something stronger, or to improve something

name: effectively
trans: in a way that is successful and produces the intended results

name: frailty
trans: physical weakness; lack of health or strength

name: renowned
trans: famous for something

name: prominent
trans: very noticeable, important, or famous

name: emerge
trans: to appear by coming out of something or out from behind something

name: illusion
trans: an idea or belief that is not true, or something that is not what it seems to be

name: reminiscent
trans: causing to think of something in the past

name: considerably
trans: significantly

name: merge
trans: to combine or join together

name: atmosphere
trans: the mixture of gases that surrounds some planets, such as the earth; the air
